Popular Services

Vehicle Repair

We have a proven track record with over 12 years of experience in the industry, so you can rest assured that your vehicle is in safe hands.

More Information

Fault Diagnosis

If you aren't quite sure what is wrong with your vehicle, we'd be happy to take a look at it and provide you with a comprehensive report of our findings.

More Information

MOT & Servicing

Is your annual MOT creeping up on you? We are fully certified to carry out MOT inspections and issue certifications to vehicles which successfully pass.

More Information

Tyre Replacement & Repair

Have you got a slow puncture or flat tyre? If so, we are able to collect your vehicle from its current location and replace the faulty tyre.

More Information

Collection & Drop off

If, for whatever reason, you can't get your vehicle to us we'd be happy to come and collect it from its current location. We can also arrange to have your car returned to a location of your choice, when it is repaired.

More Information

Why Choose Us?

Having been in the industry for over 12 years we have a proven track record in repairing mechanical, electrical and hydraulic systems. We have a fully equipped workshop with high precision tools to aid us with repairs and fault diagnosis.

We have a proven track record within the motoring industry and have received accreditation from multiple trade bodies including the RMI and IMI.

We have also received multiple awards for our work on the trusted whocanfixmycar.com website, including their coveted National Top Performer and Gold Customer Service badges.
